verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glory to God, glory to God,
Glory to the Father. x2
To him be glory forever, x2
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen,
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory to God, glory to God,
Glory to the Father. x2
To him be glory forever, x2
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen,
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Glory to God, glory to God,
Glory to the Spirit. x2
To him be glory forever, x2
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen,
Allelluia Amen, Allelluia Amen.
